markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Primal Rampage](/Feats.aspx?ID=5648) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Lizardfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=760" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 27 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You gain [_unfettered movement_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1732) and [_mountain resilience_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1610) as 4th-rank primal innate spells that you can cast once per day. As a 3-action activity, you can Cast a Spell twice to cast both of these innate spells, as long as they are both still available for the day.
name: Primal Rampage
